post.description: 将一个已经存在的集群导入到ckman

get.description: 根据集群名获取集群的信息

delete.description: 删除一个集群，但是并没有销毁该集群

put.description: 销毁集群，删除所有数据，并卸载服务

post.description: 创建逻辑表，如果某个物理集群上没有本地表，会同步创建

get.description: 获取集群各个节点的状态

put.description: 将集群内的某一个节点上线
将集群内的某一个节点下线

post.description: 增加集群节点，可对已有shard增加副本，也可直接增加新的shard
探测集群是否可以正常对外提供服务
删除表某个时间范围内的数据
post.summary: 删除表某个时间范围内的数据

put.description: 均衡集群，可以按照partition和shardingkey均衡，如果没有指定shardingkey，默认按照

parameters.description: if all = true, rebalance all tables, else only rebalance tables witch in requests
parameters.name: all

put.description: 启动集群里所有节点的ck服务，会跳过已经启动的节点
停止集群内所有节点，会跳过已经停止的节点

delete.description: 删除指定表及其所有关联表，包括本地表，分布式表，逻辑表，物化视图，本地聚合表，分布式聚合表，逻辑聚合表，聚合物化视图
delete.summary: 删除指定表及其所有关联表，包括本地表，分布式表，逻辑表，物化视图， 本地聚合表，分布式聚合表，逻辑聚合表，聚合物化视图

get.description: 获取所有的分布式表和逻辑表

parameters.description: filtered by database, if database is empty, select all databases
parameters.name: database

parameters.description: return columns, if columns is empty, return all columns
parameters.name: columns

200.description: {"code":"0000","msg":"ok","data":"{\"create_table_query\": \"CREATE TABLE default.apache_access_log (`@collectiontime` DateTime, `@hostname` LowCardinality(String), `@ip` LowCardinality(String), `@path` String, `@lineno` Int64, `@message` String, `agent` String, `auth` String, `bytes` Int64, `clientIp` String, `device_family` LowCardinality(String), `httpversion` LowCardinality(String), `ident` String, `os_family` LowCardinality(String), `os_major` LowCardinality(String), `os_minor` LowCardinality(String), `referrer` String, `request` String, `requesttime` Float64, `response` LowCardinality(String), `timestamp` DateTime64(3), `userAgent_family` LowCardinality(String), `userAgent_major` LowCardinality(String), `userAgent_minor` LowCardinality(String), `verb` LowCardinality(String), `xforwardfor` LowCardinality(String)) ENGINE = ReplicatedMergeTree('/clickhouse/tables/{cluster}/{shard}/default/apache_access_log', '{replica}') PARTITION BY toYYYYMMDD(timestamp) ORDER BY (timestamp, `@hostname`, `@path`, `@lineno`) SETTINGS index_granularity = 8192 │ ReplicatedMergeTree('/clickhouse/tables/{cluster}/{shard}/default/apache_access_log', '{replica}') PARTITION BY toYYYYMMDD(timestamp) ORDER BY (timestamp, `@hostname`, `@path`, `@lineno`) SETTINGS index_granularity = 8192\"}

get.summary: 获取正在运行的任务个数

get.description: 根据任务ID获取任务状态

policy.description:
0 split partition by day
1 split partition by week
2 split partition by month

except_max_shard.description: remove the max shard's data to other shards

disks.description: Every disk shall be in storage.Disks
